backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing presale state, tracking contributions and allocations, enforcing cap and status, and exposing query endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two animation and accessibility-related frontend features with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend components, hooks, utilities, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind global styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and shared element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document mounting the React app and loading the main client script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling hero, status, contributor, and footer sections with animated background effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link with tracking.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Displays aggregated contributor data in a table with loading states and relative timestamps.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Renders a neon-styled 24‑hour countdown timer using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Shows the presale deposit address and allows copying it with visual confirmation.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Hero section with floating animated meme-dog image, animated headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: UI section explaining three-step presale contribution instructions and listing key presale details using constants.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Displays presale progress bar, ICP stats, and an end badge based on status data fetched via usePresaleStatus.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress, and deposit address into one status section using several subcomponents.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Shows tokenomics details using constants and includes a FAQ section describing the project and presale process.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants including deposit address, ICP cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches contributor list via actor.getAllContributors with periodic polling tied to presale settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Implements a 24‑hour countdown timer returning hours, minutes, and seconds remaining.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and status management using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Polls backend presale status via actor.getPresaleStatus at a fixed interval using react‑query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, and multiple neon/animated utility classes for styling the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider, importing global styles.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates raw contribution entries by address, summing amounts, counting entries, and sorting by latest timestamp.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including custom OKLCH color variables, neon colors, container settings, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, requirements, features, and architectural notes for the ICP-based presale website.
